name: Runner Demo (Blur)
description:
This is an early prototype of an FPS parkour game I plan on making. I'm not 100% what it will turn into, I want something multiplayer and something replayable and just in general, fun to play. To achieve that, the movement has to be fun as well and this is currently in the stage its in.

PLEASE GIVE ANY FEEDBACK

Even if you think its garbage I would like to know. Thank you so much! P.S: There is technically a way to 'beat" this demo, if you get to the highest point it shows how long it took you to get there
